api.name: Nokia User Interface API
api.description: The Nokia User Interface API provides some advanced drawing functionalities.

api.name: Mobile Media API
api.description: The Mobile Media API provides functionalities for playing and capturing sounds and videos.

api.name: Mobile Media API 1.1
api.description: The Mobile Media API 1.1 provides functionalities for playing and capturing sounds and videos.

api.name: Mobile Media API 1.2
api.description: The Mobile Media API 1.2 provides functionalities for playing and capturing sounds and videos.

api.name: Wireless Messaging API
api.description: The Wireless Messaging API provides functionalities for sending and receiving messages (SMS).
api.names: wmapi, wm-api, JSR-120, JSR120, wma, wmapi-1.1, wmapi1.1,wmapi-1.0,wmapi1.0

api.name: Wireless Messaging API 2.0
api.description: The Wireless Messaging API 2.0 provides functionalities for sending and receiving text and multimedia messages (SMS and MMS).

api.name: Location API
api.description: The Location API provides functionalities for determing the position of the user.

api.name: Bluetooth API
api.description: The Bluetooth API provides functionalities for data exchange with other bluetooth devices.
api.names: btapi,bt-api, bluetooth, bluetooth-api, JSR-082, JSR-82, JSR82

api.name: 3D API
api.description: The Mobile 3D Graphics API provides 3D functions for J2ME.

api.name: Java Technology for the Wireless Industry.
api.description: A JSR-185 compatible device supports the the WMAPI as well as the MIDP/2.0 platform. The MMAPI is only conditionally required (when the device has J2ME Multimedia APIs).

api.name: PDA Optional Packages
api.description: The PDA Optional Packages API defines one package for Personal Information Management (PIM) access, and one package for accessing file systems through the Generic Connection Framework (GCF).

api.name: PIM API
api.description: Package for Personal Information Management (PIM) access.

api.name: FileConnection API
api.description: Package for accessing file systems through the Generic Connection Framework (GCF).

api.name: Motorola Lightweight Windowing Toolkit
api.description: Motorola specific graphical user interface (GUI) extension for J2ME technology-enabled wireless phones.

api.name: Vodafone Service Class Library
api.description: A JBlend extension for some devices of the Vodafone operator.

api.name: Vodafone Service Class Library 1.0
api.description: A JBlend extension for some devices of the Vodafone operator.

api.name: Vodafone Service Class Library 1.0.1
api.description: A JBlend extension for some devices of the Vodafone operator.

api.name: Vodafone Service Class Library 1.1.0
api.description: A JBlend extension for some devices of the Vodafone operator.

api.name: Vodafone Service Class Library 2.0
api.description: A JBlend extension for some devices of the Vodafone operator.

api.name: Vodafone Service Class Library 2.1
api.description: A JBlend extension for some devices of the Vodafone operator.

api.name: Siemens Game API
api.description: An obsolete b/w gaming API.

api.name: Siemens Color Game API
api.description: A predecessor of the MIDP/2.0 game API without transformations.

api.name: Siemens Extension API
api.description: A collection of additional classes for Siemens MIDP/1.0 devices.

api.name: Scalable 2D Vector Graphics
api.description: A library that allows you to use vector graphics in your application.
api.names: JSR-226, JSR226, S2VG, m2g, svg, svgapi, svg-api

api.name: Advanced Multimedia Supplements
api.description: Extensions for handling multimedia content as a supplement to the MMAPI.
api.names: JSR-234, JSR234, advancedmultimedia, advanced-multimedia, advancedmmapi, ams

api.name: DoJa 1.5 Overseas
api.description: DoJa is a Japanese Java version for mobile devices.

api.name: J2ME Polish SE Runtime
api.description: J2ME Polish Runtime

api.name: Webservices API
api.description: Allows to access SOAP webservices.

api.name: Security and Trust Services API
api.description: Provides J2ME applications with APIs for security and trust services through the integration of a Security Element.

api.name: Security and Trust Services API - APDU
api.description: Provides J2ME applications with APDU APIs for security and trust services through the integration of a Security Element.

api.name: Security and Trust Services API - CRYPTO
api.description: Provides J2ME applications with CRYPTO APIs for security and trust services through the integration of a Security Element.

api.name: Security and Trust Services API - JCRMI
api.description: Provides J2ME applications with JCRMI APIs for security and trust services through the integration of a Security Element.

api.name: Security and Trust Services API - PKI
api.description: Provides J2ME applications with PKI APIs for security and trust services through the integration of a Security Element.

api.name: SIP API
api.description: The SIP API enables SIP applications to be executed in memory limited terminals, especially targeting to mobile phones.

api.name: Content Handler API
api.description: Enabling J2ME applications to handle multi-media and web content can give developers and users a seamless and integrated user environment on mobile phones and wireless devices.
api.names: content, contentapi, content-api, contenthandlerapi,chapi, contenthandler, contenthandler-api, JSR-211, JSR211

api.name: Payment API
api.description: Enabling application developers to initiate mobile payment transactions in J2ME applications.

api.name: Mobile Internationalization API
api.description: Enabling application developers to initiate mobile payment transactions in J2ME applications.
api.names: internationalization, internationalization-api, i18n, i18n-api, JSR-238, JSR238,global, global-api

api.name: OpenGL ES Bindings
api.description: Java bindings to the OpenGL ES (Embedded Subset) native 3D graphics library.

api.name: Samsung API
api.description: Classes for sms, audio, light etc. for Samsung devices

api.name: Mobile Sensor API
api.description: Classes for sensors

api.name: Sprint API
api.description: Classes for sms, audio, light, etc. for Sprint devices

api.name: Motorola game API
api.description: Classes for sms, audio, light, etc. for Motorola devices

api.name: LG API
api.description: Classes for light, graphical effects, etc. for LG devices

api.name: Contactless Communication API
api.description: Contactless communication can be used to provide a small amount of information to applications from some other medium, for example, links to some content or identifiers for services etc. Contactless communication can be based on e.g. Radio Frequency Identification (RFID), Near Field Communication (NFC) or bar codes.

api.name: Contactless Communication API Extension
api.description: Extension of JSR 257.

api.name: Enough Software Windows Helper API
api.description: Classes to interact with Windows/.Net environment from within Java.

api.name: Enough Software iPhone Helper API
api.description: Classes to interact with Apple iPhone environment from within Java.
